title: Such a Little Thing (3R80)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Moria
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Maneuver: Spot a [Moria] minion to wound Boromir 3 times. The Free Peoples player may discard 2 Free Peoples possessions to prevent this.
Lore:	”'Boromir… give the Ring to Frodo.'”
Rarity:	R
